item.title: We are experiencing changes in sales models
item.description:
We are experiencing changes in sales models

In the meantime, we can witness a drastic change in sales models - the phenomenon directly connected with an increasing penetration of the Internet gaining more ground in consumer behaviour. The study shows that:

item.title: Sources of weakness in modern marketing
item.description:
Sources of weakness in modern marketing

It is more than a hundred years since John Wanamaker uttered the famous words:„Half the money I spend on advertising is wasted. The trouble is I do not know which half”. An IBM CMO study carried out last year among marketing directors reveals that not much has changed since that then:

item.title: Chi e perchè ha ideato Malpa Interactive?
item.description:
Chi e perchè ha ideato Malpa Interactive?

Come prima cosa voglio presentarvi, in modo dettagliato i due "creatori" di questa nuova realtà con sede a Varsavia (Polonia).
